why this game is shit?
toxic community, every enemy or mate want to explain how to play this game. nearly everybody think hes good at it. and the best is, dev's are to stupid to code a good anticheat software. i've got several accounts, from silver 2, to LEM.. in nearly every game there is at least 1 cheater. why i know this you may ask?
i know this game well, i have over 7k hours in csgo and another 10k in css, i am NOT the best, and i was cheating in this game a few years ago. i can feel if you are good or trash cheater. give me 5 headshots and i can tell you 100% sure if you cheat or not. 
it is not just the cheater problem, whole comm is a huge jobless piece of shit, they dont know what to do with time and waste it in csgo.
